title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 214: Featuring Kirby Dach + Barstool Chief
description:
On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by the 3rd overall pick by the Chicago Blackhawks in the 2019 NHL draft, Kirby Dach. Kirby joins to talk about his first NHL goal, getting grilled at the NHL draft, the city of Chicago and much more. The guys then swing by Barstool Chicago for a sit down interview with die-hard Blackhawks fan, Barstool Chief. The guys talk some NHL news as well and wrap up with a gambling corner from RA, even though his picks haven't been the greatest lately.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
